name: Sharpclaw
text: Your nails are large and strong.
benefit: You gain two claw attacks. These are primary natural attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to increase the damage die of your claw attacks to 1d6 until the start of your next turn.
benefit_zh: 你获得两次爪抓攻击。这是主要天武攻击，它们可以造成1d4点伤害。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来提升你的爪抓攻击伤害骰至1d6，直到你的下一回合开始。
